amendatorysection.chaptername: State Uni., State Colleges, and Post. Education
amendatorysection.para: Nothing in sections 85-1801 to 85-1813 shall be deemed to prohibit both resident and nonresident participants and designated beneficiaries from being eligible to participate in and benefit from the Nebraska educational savings plan trust and program. It is the intent of the Legislature that funds and income credited to the program fund are fully portable and may be used at any eligible educational institution.
